name: Quantum Lock (itch) (Electroshockist)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Left-click to grab

Right-click to bind objects together

Right-click while not looking at a bindable object to clear all binds 

This is a game made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam in 48 hours with the theme "Joined Together".

I may or may not continue development on this after it the jam.
